_.name: IrvineSystems_Sagawa
_.summary: Shipping Japan Sgw will make available in your store every shipping methods from Sagawa Hikyaku Express which can be now totally available for you!
_.description:
The Only Fully Operative Magento extension for Sagawa Express Co.,Ltd. Shipping!
This unique extension is part of the notorious and exclusive Irvine Systems series "Shipping Japan" which cover all major shipping carriers in Japan. Shipping Japan Sgw will make available in your store every shipping methods from Sagawa Hikyaku Express which can be now totally available for you! The extension feature also a great variety of "optional" settings in the back-end of your store for totally personalize your rates in order to fully reflect your company needs and policies and fully configure the slips export and Import fully compatible with Sagawa Express Label software. All the rates have been fully analyzed directly with Sagawa Express and integrated in the module. Every single specific option or limitation is taken in consideration for guaranty the absolute accuracy of the system and your precious customers quotes. Anything you need to completely integrate Sagawa Express Shipments with your Magento Store is available for you thanks to the Irvine Systems Exclusive Shipping Japan Sgw!
_.notes: Not compatible with Magento CE prior 1.4.2
